name: Roasted Garlic And Jalapeno Mashed Potatoes
keywords: garlic, jalapeño, potato, gluten-free, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 jalapeno pepper, stemmed, seeded and minced
1/2 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the potatoes and cut them into 1-inch cubes. Place in a medium-size saucepan, cover with water and bring to a boil over medium heat. Reduce the heat and simmer until tender, about 12 minutes. Drain and pass the potatoes through a ricer into a medium-size bowl.
Stir the yogurt and milk into the hot potatoes. Add the roasted garlic, jalapeno, cayenne, salt and pepper and mix well. Divide among 4 plates and serve immediately.
